Class DatabaseHelperTest

java.lang.Object
databasePart1.DatabaseHelperTest
public class DatabaseHelperTest extends Object
Test class for DatabaseHelper.

This class contains unit tests for verifying the functionality of the DatabaseHelper class, including database operations for reviews, trusted reviewers, questions, and answers.

Version:
1.0
Author:
CSE360 Team
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • DatabaseHelperTest

      public DatabaseHelperTest()

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      public void setUp() throws SQLException
      Sets up the test environment before each test.

      Creates a new DatabaseHelper instance and establishes a database connection. Generates a unique ID for each test run to avoid conflicts between tests.

      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • tearDown

      public void tearDown()
      Cleans up resources after each test.

      Closes the database connection if it's open.

    • testAddAndGetReview

      public void testAddAndGetReview() throws SQLException
      Tests adding and retrieving a review from the database.

      Verifies that a review can be saved to the database and then retrieved with all its properties intact.

      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • testUpdateReview

      public void testUpdateReview() throws SQLException
      Tests updating a review in the database.

      Verifies that a review's content can be updated in the database.

      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • testDeleteReview

      public void testDeleteReview() throws SQLException
      Tests deleting a review from the database.

      Verifies that a review can be deleted from the database.

      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • testGetReviewsByReviewer

      public void testGetReviewsByReviewer() throws SQLException
      Tests retrieving reviews by reviewer from the database.

      Verifies that reviews can be retrieved based on the reviewer's username.

      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • testTrustedReviewers

      public void testTrustedReviewers() throws SQLException
      Tests the trusted reviewers functionality in the database.

      Verifies that trusted reviewers can be added, updated, and retrieved.

      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • testReviewsFromTrustedReviewers

      public void testReviewsFromTrustedReviewers() throws SQLException
      Tests retrieving reviews from trusted reviewers.

      Verifies that reviews can be filtered based on trusted reviewer status.

      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • testLoadAllDiscussionContent

      public void testLoadAllDiscussionContent() throws SQLException
      Tests loading all discussion content from the database.

      Verifies that questions and answers can be loaded from the database into their respective collection objects.

      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • testFixReviewsTable

      public void testFixReviewsTable() throws SQLException
      Tests the fixReviewsTable method.

      Verifies that the method runs without throwing exceptions.

      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • testReviewsWithRating

      public void testReviewsWithRating() throws SQLException
      Tests review rating operations in the database.

      Verifies that reviews with different ratings can be stored and retrieved, and that aggregate operations on ratings (average, min, max) work correctly.

      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs
